duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and communicate a vision and implementation strategies for local and regional technology groups.
Maintain active market knowledge and support regional and corporate strategic initiatives.
Guide business development efforts and coordinate teaming decisions with leadership.
Drive the use of innovative technology within the markets served by VHB core service groups in the region.
Manage and grow key client relationships and establish strategic partnerships with technology vendors.
Serve as team leader of the regional technology staff and support the advancement of elevating data/technology with the regional team members.
Take an active role in the development and mentoring of staff, as well as manage and maintain project schedules and budgets.
Collaborate with PMO to manage financial progress on projects and represent VHB at regional conferences, seminars, and industry events.
Manage and prepare technical and cost proposals and develop or oversee training programs that position VHB to be forward-thinking on data and technology initiatives.

education_certification.credential: BS in Computer Science or related discipline (Master's preferred)
10+ years of IT experience, preferably in the AEC industry
